title: Ford CEO Farley Says EV Overhaul Is a Great Investment
description: Ford CEO Jim Farley says the overhaul of its electric vehicle business will be "profit positive" and discusses the automaker's pivot to energy storage. He speaks on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
